article: Look! This is a photo of our class. The man _ a beard  is our English teacher, Mr. Hu . He isn't young, but he isn't _ . He is a tall man. He has a round _ and black hair. The man  next to him is our Chinese teacher, Mr. Wang . I think he is very clever because he has a little hair. He likes _ jokes. Do you know the man in black. He is our math teacher, Mr. Wu. He is good at teaching math. He sings _ . There  _ fifty students in our class. We all like them.
